items.name: Espresso
items.description: A concentrated coffee beverage brewed by forcing hot water under pressure through finely-ground coffee beans.

items.name: Americano
items.description: Espresso shots topped with hot water create a light layer of crema culminating in this wonderfully rich cup.

items.name: Matcha Tiramisu
items.description: A delightful Japanese twist on the classic Italian dessert, featuring layers of matcha-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cream.

items.name: Lavender Hot Chocolate
items.description: A unique and aromatic beverage combining the soothing floral notes of lavender with rich, decadent hot chocolate.

items.name: Vanilla Eclair
items.description: A classic French pastry with a crisp choux dough shell, filled with a rich vanilla cream and topped with chocolate icing.

items.name: Iced Matcha Latte
items.description: A refreshing blend of finely ground green tea powder, milk, and a touch of sweetness, served over ice.

items.name: Croissant
items.description: A buttery, flaky, and viennoiserie pastry of Austrian origin, named for its historical crescent shape.

items.name: Caramel Macchiato
items.description: Freshly steamed milk with vanilla-flavored syrup marked with espresso and topped with a caramel drizzle.
